trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Oregon City
There were no other sightings in Oregon City on or around April 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailsthe object was dark in color,had 3 red pulsating,not flashing lights at the bottom.one at the end of each wing and one in the center of the main front part.no sound at all. my son,his friend and i were heading to south end road market\gas station when we saw a red blur fly over our yukon,the sun roof was open so we saw it good.i got on the gas and rounded a bend in the road and observed it up ahead over a big steel power line carrier and a field. i stoped my truck and got out to see if it was a conventianal craft,i.e engine noise etc..but there was nothing.just 3 red lights that stoped pulsating as it sat there. my sons friend had a cell phone so i told him to get the camera on and give it to me,he did but as i pointed the phone toward the object shaped as a giant v the phone went black.i hollerd and cursed because i thought he had handed it to me off,but he said he turned the camera on himself..so..i got back in my truck and just as i did that it turned 180 deg. and zoomed off the direction it came,and kinda shuffled to the left. all 3 of us saw this thing.it was about 150 feet or so across and hooverd about 500-700 feet of the ground.so we saw it pretty good. no way man made that thing with the technology we have now! i reported it to the local clown house a.k.a police dept. and they said it was probably someones private craft!!how funny!!!
